publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1567 Mr Andy Kerr: Water Services etc. (Scotland) Bill - Financial Resolution-That the Parliament, for the purposes of any Act of the Scottish Parliament resulting from the Water Services etc. (Scotland) Bill, agrees to- (a) any expenditure or increase in expenditure of a kind referred to in Rule 9.12.3(b)(ii) or (iii) of the Parliament's Standing Orders, and (b) any payments in relation to which Rule 9.12.4 of the Standing Orders applies, arising in consequence of the Act.
